Name: Operation8 Project
About the game: Operation8 Project is one of the world's elite mercenary groups. You are a newly hired mercenary. Store: There are various weapons available to purchase and use in the fast-paced game. List of weapon types Will you rise through the ranks to become an elite? Multiply game modes Team Deathmatch (TDM) Free For All (FFA) to have a base, a conflict between 2 factions or maybe a post apocalyptic world So the people who play operation8, not only play because it is fun but also fall in love with the game for its fictional history.
